thread.title: L.M.D.

author: L.M.D.
title: L.M.D.
text: I have purchased various machines from different online sellers and must say that my experience with WLL has been stellar. Their sales team led to purchase an amazing Pro-sumer machine and helped steer me in the right direction based on quality concerns and overall value. I couldn't be happier with my machine and now I am getting all kinds of free accessories with my WLL points...best espresso supply company hands down.
